translated: Points of Controversy
The Great Fifty
The twentieth section
The discussion of all directions
Is it the case that Buddhas stand in all directions?
You may reply.
Is it the case that a Buddha stands in the eastern direction?
You may not say so.
Is it the case that a Buddha stands in the eastern direction?
